name: Aquila (Jito)
description:
Aquila is a game made for the GMTK game jam with the theme of " Joined Together".

Controls - 

Use 'A' and 'D' to build momentum when swinging

Press 'R' to restart 
Hold 'LeftClick' to fire your bow
Hold 'RightClick' to grab onto your bow and swing,
Press'E' to pick up your bow

Developers Contacts : 
ScottishChicken#1342
toam#2678

music: 

https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Axletree/Quoin_EP/Axletree_-_01_-_Quoin_feat_...

Quoin (feat. Andrew Freidin) by AxleTree

Story:

This game follows the player, Aquila, as she tries to rescue her dog Charlie in a tomb as he has been stolen by the EYELORD
